spec_data.Name: libirman-devel
spec_data.Description:
Libraries and header files for developing applications that use libirman.

The IrMan hardware((http://www.intolect.com/irmandetail.htm) is  nowadays
discontinued. However, some modern hardware (notably the irtoy) is able to
emulate the irman protocol.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 09:48:34 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
